name: Forsaken LU
description:
forsaken is a survival game with a great visual design that you can play alone. Your goal in this game is to collect wood and stone to build a house and spend the night.

Potential
we will bring a new update to the game they will be added with new update
Animals
map will be enlarged
graphics improvement
sound improvement
new objects for home decoration
multiplayer feature

Keyboard Controls
WASD: Move
E: Build / Interact
Q: Build menu
1: Axe
2: Pickaxe
3: Hammer
RMB: Hammer Menu
Save Buildings: 8
Load Buildings: 9

Controller Controls
Right Stick: Move
Left Stick: Look
X / Square: Build / Interact
D-Pad UP: Axe
D-Pad Right: Pickaxe
D-Pad Down: Hammer
Y / Triangle: Hammer Menu
Menu Button: Settings

Feedback
We are waiting for your feedback and suggestions about the game, you can send us the things you want us to add to the game, we will evaluate them
